|brand = Google |model = Nest Hub |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = Max |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = H2A |wlclass = AC600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless speakers, media streamer, IoT hub |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = A4RH2A |icid = 10395A-H2A |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Amlogic;T931; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_cores2 = 2 |cpu1_total_cores = 6 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A73 |cpu1_type2 = ARM |cpu1_type2_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.8 GHz <!-- undocumented --> |cpu1spd2 = 1.9 GHz<!-- undocumented --> |gpu1chip1 = Mali;-G52 MP6; |gpu1_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |gpu1_type = ARM |gpu1_type_rev = <!-- GPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |gpu1spd = <!-- gpu speed, MHz, GHz, Leave blank if unknown --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = eMMC |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;KLM4G1FETE-B041; |flash1size = 4 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = D9WVN<!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Micron;MT53E512M32D2NP-053 WT:E; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = <!-- VDC,VAC, or POE, --> |pwr_vdc = <!-- DC Volts --> |pwr_amp_dc = <!-- DC Amps --> |pwr_vac = <!-- AC Volts --> |pwr_ac_hz = <!-- AC Hertz --> |pwr_amp_ac = <!-- AC Amps --> |pwr_poe_type = <!-- Type of POE --> |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = <!-- Connector Type --> |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 5.0, DFS (master), |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/07/2019 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B085DH3VSC |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43458; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |rad1ac = 433 |rad1n = 150/150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== [https://www.blog.google/products/google-nest/nest-hub-max-features/ Features] *[[Google Nest Hub Max (H2A)]] • (May 7, 2019) :FCC ID: A4RH2A (2019-05-07) • BoM
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Amlogic]] T931 - Hexa-core [https://www.cnx-software.com/2019/03/25/amlogic-s922d-a311d-a311x-ai-processors-npu/ S922D] w/ NPU :Quad-core @1.8GHz (ARM Cortex-A73), :Dual-core @1.9GHz (ARM Cortex-A53) :GPU: Mali-G52 MP6, [https://mobile.twitter.com/androidtv_rumor/status/1147053818036785153 60K DMIPS] *Display: 10.1", 1280×800 (150 ppi), touchscreen *Camera: 6.5Mp (Sony IMX277 - 12Mp ?) {{FCC ST|03/19/2019}}
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.pcmag.com/reviews/google-nest-hub-max ''Google Nest Hub Max'' on '''PC|Mag'''] *[https://support.google.com/googlehome/answer/7072284 ''Google Home Spec'' on '''Google''']
==See also== ===Models=== :;[[Google Devices]] • [[List of Wireless Speaker Systems]] *[[Google Home]] • [https://www.engadget.com/2016/11/03/google-home-review/ Engadget] • [https://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/Google+Home+Teardown/72684 iFixit] *[[Google Home Max (H0B)]] • [https://www.engadget.com/2017/12/19/google-home-max-review/ Engadget] *[[Google Home Mini (H0A)]] • [https://teardowns.abiresearch.com/teardowns/pe_googleteardown-home-mini-h0a-0/ ABI] • [https://medium.com/@justlv/google-home-mini-teardown-comparison-to-echo-dot-and-giving-technology-a-voice-c59a23724a26 Medium] *[[Google Home Hub (H1A)]] • FCC ID: A4RH1A :''Google Nest Hub'' (2019) *[[Google Nest Hub Max (H2A)]] • FCC ID: A4RH2A :''Google Nest Hub Max'' (2019) *[[Google Nest Mini (H2C)]] • FCC ID: A4R-H2C <!-- AS370 - BG6CDZ1F --> :''Google Nest Audio'' (2020)
